table.name: SYS_USER_1
table.mysql: CREATE TABLE SYS_USER_1 ( ID char(18) NOT NULL COMMENT 'id', LOGIN_NAME varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '登录名', NAME varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '真实名字', PWD varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密码', PHONE char(11) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '手机号码', EMAIL varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Email地址', STATUS char(1) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户状态 0锁定 1正常', PRIMARY KEY (ID) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT COMMENT='系统用户表'
